KnowledgeBase.Title: isPcodeVector
KnowledgeBase.ArgumentTypes:
Character String Symbol Vector BitVector ByteVector IntVector
FltVector ObjVector Structure Dictionary Directory
PcodeVector Matrix NumMatrix Integer Float Number Complex Boolean
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: isType isBitVector isFloatVector isIntegerVector isByteVector isIdentical isNumberVector isObjectVector isVector
KnowledgeBase.HumanKeywords: Vector bit byte bitvector Boolean virtual machine instructions tail pcode

Function.Description: The isPcodeVector function returns true if the argument is a Pcode Vector; otherwise, false is returned.

Brief.Overview: The isPcodeVector function returns true if the argument {obj} is a Pcode Vector; otherwise, false is returned.
Brief.Usage: The isPcodeVector function is a Boolean function that determines if an object is a Pcode Vector.

Argument.Name: obj
Argument.AISTypes:
Character, String, Symbol, Vector, BitVector, ByteVector, IntVector,
FltVector, ObjVector, Structure, Dictionary, Directory,
Matrix, NumMatrix, Integer, Float, Number, Complex, Boolean

Syntax.Return: Returns true if the object is a Pcode Vector, otherwise false is returned.
